attributes.action: Make all MP's vote in the Brexit bills per their constituency vote on Brexit.
attributes.background: The MP's voting against their constituents wishes are not representing their constituents. They are merely following their own arrogant belief that they know better than their constituents.  They are supposed to represent the people not do what they like.

rejection.details: Individual MPs are responsible for deciding how they vote in Parliament, not the UK Government or the House of Commons as a whole.
